name: Day of Reckoning
description: After each life comes death, and the promise of new life that must be nurtured.
effect: Followers of Yveltal may call upon 'Day of Reckoning' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to apply up to +5 flat damage to their next damage roll (before defense calculations, but after critical hits). For each tick of additional damage, the user of this boon sacrifices 2 HP (up to 10 HP total). At each rank beyond Initiate, gain the ability to sacrifice 2 more HP for 1 more damage.
